verses.verse: Now these <WH428> are the priests <WH3548> and the Levites <WH3881> that <WH834> went up <WH5927> with <WH5973> Zerubbabel <WH2216> the son <WH1121> of Shealtiel, <WH7597> and Jeshua: <WH3442> Seraiah, <WH8304> Jeremiah, <WH3414> Ezra, <WH5830>
Amariah, <WH568> Malluch, <WH4409> Hattush, <WH2407>
Shechaniah, <WH7935> Rehum, <WH7348> Meremoth, <WH4822>
Iddo, <WH5714> Ginnetho, <WH1599> Abijah, <WH29>
Miamin, <WH4326> Maadiah, <WH4573> Bilgah, <WH1083>
Shemaiah, <WH8098> and Joiarib, <WH3114> Jedaiah, <WH3048>
Sallu, <WH5543> Amok, <WH5987> Hilkiah, <WH2518> Jedaiah. <WH3048> These <WH428> were the chief <WH7218> of the priests <WH3548> and of their brethren <WH251> in the days <WH3117> of Jeshua. <WH3442>

Moreover the Levites: <WH3881> Jeshua, <WH3442> Binnui, <WH1131> Kadmiel, <WH6934> Sherebiah, <WH8274> Judah, <WH3063> and Mattaniah, <WH4983> which was over <WH5921> the thanksgiving, <WH1960> he <WH1931> and his brethren. <WH251>
Also Bakbukiah <WH1229> and Unni, <WH6042> their brethren, <WH251> were over against <WH5048> them in the watches. <WH4931>
And Jeshua <WH3442> begot <WH3205> <WH853> Joiakim, <WH3113> Joiakim <WH3113> also begot <WH3205> <WH853> Eliashib, <WH475> and Eliashib <WH475> begot <WH3205> <WH853> Joiada, <WH3111>
And Joiada <WH3111> begot <WH3205> <WH853> Jonathan, <WH3129> and Jonathan <WH3129> begot <WH3205> <WH853> Jaddua. <WH3037>
And in the days <WH3117> of Joiakim <WH3113> were <WH1961> priests, <WH3548> the chief <WH7218> of the fathers: <WH1> of Seraiah, <WH8304> Meraiah; <WH4811> of Jeremiah, <WH3414> Hananiah; <WH2608>
Of Ezra, <WH5830> Meshullam; <WH4918> of Amariah, <WH568> Jehohanan; <WH3076>
Of Melicu, <WH4409> Jonathan; <WH3129> of Shebaniah, <WH7645> Joseph; <WH3130>
Of Harim, <WH2766> Adna; <WH5733> of Meraioth, <WH4812> Helkai; <WH2517>
Of Iddo, <WH5714> Zechariah; <WH2148> of Ginnethon, <WH1599> Meshullam; <WH4918>
Of Abijah, <WH29> Zichri; <WH2147> of Miniamin, <WH4509> of Moadiah, <WH4153> Piltai; <WH6408>
Of Bilgah, <WH1083> Shammua; <WH8051> of Shemaiah, <WH8098> Jehonathan; <WH3083>
And of Joiarib, <WH3114> Mattenai; <WH4982> of Jedaiah, <WH3048> Uzzi; <WH5813>
Of Sallai, <WH5543> Kallai; <WH7040> of Amok, <WH5987> Eber; <WH5677>
Of Hilkiah, <WH2518> Hashabiah; <WH2811> of Jedaiah, <WH3048> Nethaneel. <WH5417>

The Levites <WH3881> in the days <WH3117> of Eliashib, <WH475> Joiada, <WH3111> and Johanan, <WH3110> and Jaddua, <WH3037> were recorded <WH3789> chief <WH7218> of the fathers: <WH1> also the priests, <WH3548> to <WH5921> the reign <WH4438> of Darius <WH1867> the Persian. <WH6542>

The sons <WH1121> of Levi, <WH3878> the chief <WH7218> of the fathers, <WH1> were written <WH3789> in <WH5921> the book <WH5612> of the chronicles, <WH1697> even until <WH5704> the days <WH3117> of Johanan <WH3110> the son <WH1121> of Eliashib. <WH475>

And the chief <WH7218> of the Levites: <WH3881> Hashabiah, <WH2811> Sherebiah, <WH8274> and Jeshua <WH3442> the son <WH1121> of Kadmiel, <WH6934> with their brethren <WH251> over against <WH5048> them, to praise <WH1984> and to give thanks, <WH3034> according to the commandment <WH4687> of David <WH1732> the man <WH376> of God, <WH430> ward <WH4929> over against <WH5980> ward. <WH4929>

Mattaniah, <WH4983> and Bakbukiah, <WH1229> Obadiah, <WH5662> Meshullam, <WH4918> Talmon, <WH2929> Akkub, <WH6126> were porters <WH7778> keeping <WH8104> the ward <WH4929> at the thresholds <WH624> of the gates. <WH8179>

These <WH428> were in the days <WH3117> of Joiakim <WH3113> the son <WH1121> of Jeshua, <WH3442> the son <WH1121> of Jozadak, <WH3136> and in the days <WH3117> of Nehemiah <WH5166> the governor, <WH6346> and of Ezra <WH5830> the priest, <WH3548> the scribe. <WH5608>

And at the dedication <WH2598> of the wall <WH2346> of Jerusalem <WH3389> they sought <WH1245> <WH853> the Levites <WH3881> out of all <WH4480> <WH3605> their places, <WH4725> to bring <WH935> them to Jerusalem, <WH3389> to keep <WH6213> the dedication <WH2598> with gladness, <WH8057> both with thanksgivings, <WH8426> and with singing, <WH7892> with cymbals, <WH4700> psalteries, <WH5035> and with harps. <WH3658>

And the sons <WH1121> of the singers <WH7891> gathered themselves together, <WH622> both out of <WH4480> the plain country <WH3603> round about <WH5439> Jerusalem, <WH3389> and from <WH4480> the villages <WH2691> of Netophathi; <WH5200>

Also from the house <WH4480> <WH1004> of Gilgal, <WH1537> and out of the fields <WH4480> <WH7704> of Geba <WH1387> and Azmaveth: <WH5820> for <WH3588> the singers <WH7891> had built <WH1129> them villages <WH2691> round about <WH5439> Jerusalem. <WH3389>
And the priests <WH3548> and the Levites <WH3881> purified themselves, <WH2891> and purified <WH2891> <WH853> the people, <WH5971> and the gates, <WH8179> and the wall. <WH2346>

Then I brought up <WH5927> <WH853> the princes <WH8269> of Judah <WH3063> upon <WH4480> <WH5921> the wall, <WH2346> and appointed <WH5975> two <WH8147> great <WH1419> companies of them that gave thanks, <WH8426> whereof one <WH259> went <WH1980> on the right hand <WH3225> upon <WH4480> <WH5921> the wall <WH2346> toward the dung <WH830> gate: <WH8179>
And after <WH310> them went <WH1980> Hoshaiah, <WH1955> and half <WH2677> of the princes <WH8269> of Judah, <WH3063>
And Azariah, <WH5838> Ezra, <WH5830> and Meshullam, <WH4918>
Judah, <WH3063> and Benjamin, <WH1144> and Shemaiah, <WH8098> and Jeremiah, <WH3414>

And certain of the priests' sons <WH4480> <WH1121> <WH3548> with trumpets; <WH2689> namely, Zechariah <WH2148> the son <WH1121> of Jonathan, <WH3129> the son <WH1121> of Shemaiah, <WH8098> the son <WH1121> of Mattaniah, <WH4983> the son <WH1121> of Michaiah, <WH4320> the son <WH1121> of Zaccur, <WH2139> the son <WH1121> of Asaph: <WH623>

And his brethren, <WH251> Shemaiah, <WH8098> and Azarael, <WH5832> Milalai, <WH4450> Gilalai, <WH1562> Maai, <WH4597> Nethaneel, <WH5417> and Judah, <WH3063> Hanani, <WH2607> with the musical <WH7892> instruments <WH3627> of David <WH1732> the man <WH376> of God, <WH430> and Ezra <WH5830> the scribe <WH5608> before <WH6440> them.

And at <WH5921> the fountain <WH5869> gate, <WH8179> which was over against <WH5048> them, they went up <WH5927> by <WH5921> the stairs <WH4609> of the city <WH5892> of David, <WH1732> at the going up <WH4608> of the wall, <WH2346> above <WH4480> <WH5921> the house <WH1004> of David, <WH1732> even unto <WH5704> the water <WH4325> gate <WH8179> eastward. <WH4217>

And the other <WH8145> company of them that gave thanks <WH8426> went <WH1980> over against <WH4136> them, and I <WH589> after <WH310> them, and the half <WH2677> of the people <WH5971> upon <WH4480> <WH5921> the wall, <WH2346> from beyond <WH4480> <WH5921> the tower <WH4026> of the furnaces <WH8574> even unto <WH5704> the broad <WH7342> wall; <WH2346>

And from above <WH4480> <WH5921> the gate <WH8179> of Ephraim, <WH669> and above <WH5921> the old <WH3465> gate, <WH8179> and above <WH5921> the fish <WH1709> gate, <WH8179> and the tower <WH4026> of Hananeel, <WH2606> and the tower <WH4026> of Meah, <WH3968> even unto <WH5704> the sheep <WH6629> gate: <WH8179> and they stood still <WH5975> in the prison <WH4307> gate. <WH8179>
So stood <WH5975> the two <WH8147> companies of them that gave thanks <WH8426> in the house <WH1004> of God, <WH430> and I, <WH589> and the half <WH2677> of the rulers <WH5461> with <WH5973> me:
And the priests; <WH3548> Eliakim, <WH471> Maaseiah, <WH4641> Miniamin, <WH4509> Michaiah, <WH4320> Elioenai, <WH454> Zechariah, <WH2148> and Hananiah, <WH2608> with trumpets; <WH2689>

And Maaseiah, <WH4641> and Shemaiah, <WH8098> and Eleazar, <WH499> and Uzzi, <WH5813> and Jehohanan, <WH3076> and Malchijah, <WH4441> and Elam, <WH5867> and Ezer. <WH5829> And the singers <WH7891> sang loud, <WH8085> with Jezrahiah <WH3156> their overseer. <WH6496>

Also that <WH1931> day <WH3117> they offered <WH2076> great <WH1419> sacrifices, <WH2077> and rejoiced: <WH8055> for <WH3588> God <WH430> had made them rejoice <WH8055> with great <WH1419> joy: <WH8057> the wives <WH802> also <WH1571> and the children <WH3206> rejoiced: <WH8055> so that the joy <WH8057> of Jerusalem <WH3389> was heard <WH8085> even afar off. <WH4480> <WH7350>

And at that <WH1931> time <WH3117> were some <WH376> appointed <WH6485> over <WH5921> the chambers <WH5393> for the treasures, <WH214> for the offerings, <WH8641> for the firstfruits, <WH7225> and for the tithes, <WH4643> to gather <WH3664> into them out of the fields <WH7704> of the cities <WH5892> the portions <WH4521> of the law <WH8451> for the priests <WH3548> and Levites: <WH3881> for <WH3588> Judah <WH3063> rejoiced <WH8057> for <WH5921> the priests <WH3548> and for <WH5921> the Levites <WH3881> that waited. <WH5975>

And both the singers <WH7891> and the porters <WH7778> kept <WH8104> the ward <WH4931> of their God, <WH430> and the ward <WH4931> of the purification, <WH2893> according to the commandment <WH4687> of David, <WH1732> and of Solomon <WH8010> his son. <WH1121>

For <WH3588> in the days <WH3117> of David <WH1732> and Asaph <WH623> of old <WH4480> <WH6924> there were chief <WH7218> of the singers, <WH7891> and songs <WH7892> of praise <WH8416> and thanksgiving <WH3034> unto God. <WH430>

And all <WH3605> Israel <WH3478> in the days <WH3117> of Zerubbabel, <WH2216> and in the days <WH3117> of Nehemiah, <WH5166> gave <WH5414> the portions <WH4521> of the singers <WH7891> and the porters, <WH7778> every day <WH3117> <WH3117> his portion: <WH1697> and they sanctified <WH6942> holy things unto the Levites; <WH3881> and the Levites <WH3881> sanctified <WH6942> them unto the children <WH1121> of Aaron. <WH175>
